Producer: Jules Daly, Alex Young, Iain Smith, Stephen J. Cannell, Spike Seldin, Tony Scott
Screenwriter: Joe Carnahan, Brian Bloom, Skip Woods
Production Co: Dune Entertainment, Phoenix Film Partners, 20th Century Fox, Ingenious Film Partners, Scott Free Productions, Stephen J. Cannell Productions
Rating: PG-13 (Intense Sequences of Violence|Intense Sequences of Action|Language|Smoking)
Synopsis: A man who loves when a plan comes together, Hannibal Smith leads a close knit team of elite operatives. Framed for a terrible crime, Smith and his men go rogue, using their special talents to clear their names and find the perpetrator. Hot on their trail is Charissa Sosa, who was once involved with a member of Smith's team and has sworn to capture them, no matter what it takes.
Title: The A-Team
